title: Episode 105 (video): Smart Birds are More Successful with the Ladies
description: A popular piece of animal research indicates that intelligent male Browerbirds appear to have greater mating success (researcher lingo for sex). The more sensitive birds may also be more preferred by the opposite sex as well.  So much for the jocks.  Find out about this fascinating research on animals in this video episode of The Psych Files.
